long_description: The MSR Aquatabs(R) water purification tablets are a fast and effective treatment against viruses, bacteria and Giardia cysts so you can enjoy safe drinking water on backcountry trips. Great for international travel, backpacking, emergency use or adding purification to any microfilter. Kills 99.9999% of bacteria in 30 min.; simply drop the tablets in your water bottles and wait. Imparts very little taste to water. Package contains 30 MSR Aquatabs water purification tablets, treats up to 60 liters of water.
short_description: The MSR Aquatabs(R) water purification tablets are a fast and effective treatment against viruses, bacteria and Giardia cysts so you can enjoy safe drinking water on backcountry trips.
